text: Lavatory – Lovestory is a short movie that is about a lavatory attendant that finds a bunch of flowers in her tip jar (a tin where customers give her money as a reward for a good job). The movie was nominated for an Academy Award in the 81st Annual Academy Awards and won many awards at movie festivals. == References == Category:2007 movies Category:Short movies Category:Animated movies
title: Lavatory – Lovestory
